text: Any publication by any medical utilization review committee, peer review committee, medical staff committee or tissue review committee shall keep confidential the identity of any patient whose condition, care or treatment was a part thereof.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 32-504.

1973 Ed., § 32-364.

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 44-804

Current through December 11, 2012
